title: Two Strangers in Need
description:
Crossing a windswept clearing, you notice two figures slumped on the ground. Approaching cautiously, you see a man desperately trying to staunch a bad wound on a woman's leg, clearly in shock. The man looks up, his eyes full of fear and hope.

"Please," he whispers, "We've run out of bandages and water. Can you help us? Anything..."

choices.text: [Lena] Offer them a bandage and a bottle of water.

results.text: The man thanks you with tears in his eyes. You use your resources to help them.

choices.text: [Elian] Ignore them and move on. Your resources are too precious.

results.text: You harden your heart and continue on your way, leaving them to their fate. Survival comes first.

choices.text: Approach with weapon drawn and rob them of what they have.

success.text: Your threat is effective. The man, terrified, hands you a small bag. Inside you find some ammunition.

failure.text: The man is not intimidated. He sees your hesitation and pulls out a knife. A brief struggle ensues.

title: The Suffering Creature
description:
A pitiful moan draws your attention. Hidden in the tall grass, you find a fawn with a clearly broken front leg, trapped in an old rusty bear trap. The animal looks at you with large terrified eyes, unable to escape.

A memory surfaces: your mother teaching you to respect every creature. But you also hear the echo of your father's words: 'In today's world, pity is a luxury we cannot afford.'

success.text: With a steady hand and patience, you manage to free the fawn's leg and splint it with branches and a bandage. The animal limps away, disappearing into the tall grass.

failure.text: You try to help, but your attempts are clumsy. The fawn, frightened, struggles worsening the wound. You are forced to leave it to its fate, having wasted time and a bandage.

choices.text: [Elian] Put the animal down to recover meat.

results.text: It is a difficult but pragmatic choice. You end the fawn's suffering and recover meat and hide useful for survival.

choices.text: Ignore the scene and move on.

results.text: You decide not to intervene. Nature will take its course.

title: Abandoned Truck
description: An old rusty truck lies on its side, tires half-buried in the dirt. The trailer is still closed.

outcomes.successText: The lock gives way. Inside you find crates of military supplies still sealed.
outcomes.failureText: The lock doesn't give way. You hurt your hands trying.

results.text: You find an old road map and some music CDs. Nothing useful.

title: Wild Horses
description: A small herd of wild horses grazes in the distance. They look healthy.

choices.text: Try to approach to tame them

outcomes.successText: A horse lets you approach. You spend some time together before it moves away. You learned something.
outcomes.failureText: The horses get scared and gallop away. One hits you with a hoof.

results.text: It is beautiful to see life still free in this devastated world. You grant yourself a moment of peace.

title: Ambush
description: You hear voices in the distance. Approaching cautiously, you see three raiders dividing the loot of a robbery.

outcomes.successText: You surprise them completely. They flee leaving part of their loot.
outcomes.failureText: They hear you coming. A violent clash ensues.

results.text: Three against one are not good odds. You take a wide detour to avoid them.

title: Old Windmill
description: A ruined windmill stands against the sky. Its blades creak in the wind.

choices.text: Climb to the top for a better view

outcomes.successText: From the top you see for miles. You spot a shelter to the east that could be useful.
outcomes.failureText: A rotten board gives way under your weight. You fall painfully.

choices.text: Explore the base of the mill

results.text: At the base you find old farming tools and a stock of now useless seeds.

title: Dust Storm
description: A dense cloud of dust rises on the horizon, approaching rapidly. You have a few minutes.

outcomes.successText: You find a depression in the ground and cover yourself with the tarp. The storm passes.
outcomes.failureText: You don't find adequate shelter. Dust gets into your eyes and lungs.

results.text: You cover your face and run. It is painful but you come out the other side.

title: Plane Wreckage
description: The remains of a small touring plane are scattered over a wide area. It clearly dates back to before the war.

outcomes.successText: You find the plane's emergency kit still intact and some useful tools.
outcomes.failureText: The wreckage is dangerous. You cut yourself on a sharp edge.

results.text: It is just another monument to tragedy. There is nothing for you here.

title: Merchant Caravan
description: Three people with heavy backpacks walk in a line. One of them notices you and raises a hand in cautious greeting.

outcomes.successText: They are willing to trade. They offer you medicines in exchange for metal.
outcomes.failureText: They are suspicious and refuse to deal. They move away quickly.

results.text: You don't need trouble. You continue on your way.

title: Battlefield
description: Human skeletons and scrap metal cover a wide area. It must have been a terrible battle.

outcomes.successText: You find weapons and ammunition still usable among the remains.
outcomes.failureText: Everything is too corroded or broken. You only waste time in this macabre place.

results.text: These were people once. You leave their remains in peace.

title: Wild Dog Pack
description: A pack of five stray dogs has noticed you. They are deciding whether to attack or not.

outcomes.successText: You raise your arms and yell. The dogs get scared and flee.
outcomes.failureText: It doesn't work. The pack attacks.

results.text: The dogs devour the food and let you pass without problems.

title: Scarecrow Field
description: Dozens of scarecrows are arranged in an old field. Some seem... dressed in real clothes.

outcomes.successText: You find useful items in the pockets of the clothes. Someone used them as a hiding place.
outcomes.failureText: One of the scarecrows... moves. It's not a scarecrow! It's a trap!

choices.text: The place gives you the creeps. Leave

results.text: There is something deeply wrong here. You leave quickly.

title: Traveling Doctor
description: An elderly man with a medical backpack greets you. 'I offer treatment in exchange for food or water,' he says with a tired smile.

results.text: The doctor works competently. You feel better and learned something.
You have no resources to share. The doctor nods understandingly and walks away.

title: Abandoned Radio Tower
description: An old radio transmission tower stands lonely. The door is open.

outcomes.successText: You find pre-war audio recordings and still functioning electronic components.
outcomes.failureText: The electrical system is dangerous. You get a shock.

results.text: Abandoned structures can be deadly. You decide not to risk it.

title: Lone Child
description: A child of perhaps 8 years sits alone near an extinguished fire. He looks at you with wide eyes.

results.text: The child eats greedily. He tells you his parents died. He thanks you and walks away south.

choices.text: [Elian] Leave him. You can't save everyone

results.text: It's tough, but in today's world everyone has to make it on their own. You move on.

title: Bee Swarm
description: A wild beehive has fallen from a dead tree. The bees are furious.

outcomes.successText: You run as fast as you can. The bees don't catch you.
outcomes.failureText: You are not fast enough. The bees attack you.

outcomes.successText: The smoke works. You manage to gather some precious honey.
outcomes.failureText: It doesn't work. The bees attack you anyway.

title: Mysterious Monolith
description: A shiny metal structure rises from the ground. It looks neither natural nor pre-war. What could it be?

outcomes.successText: It's modern art! A pre-war art installation. Nothing mysterious.
outcomes.failureText: You can't figure it out. Maybe it's better not to know.

results.text: Something about that structure makes you uneasy. You decide not to approach.

title: Quicksand
description: The ground beneath your feet suddenly becomes yielding. You are sinking!

outcomes.successText: You remember your father's lessons. You lie flat and roll out of the quicksand.
outcomes.failureText: Panic makes you move badly. You sink further before freeing yourself.

results.text: The more you struggle, the more you sink. Only with great effort do you manage to free yourself.

title: Supply Cache
description: You notice disturbed earth and signs of recent digging. Someone hid something here.

outcomes.successText: You find a sealed metal crate full of supplies!
outcomes.failureText: You dig for an hour finding nothing. Maybe you were wrong.

choices.text: Could be a trap. Move on

results.text: When in doubt, better not risk it. You leave the cache intact.

title: Vultures in the Sky
description: A group of vultures circles overhead up ahead. They found something.

results.text: It is a decomposing corpse. You search the remains and find something useful.
You don't need to loot the dead. You continue on your way.

title: Refugee Family
description: A family of four walks slowly south. They seem exhausted and hungry.

results.text: The family thanks you with tears in their eyes. The father offers you an old map in exchange.

choices.text: [Elian] You don't have enough for yourself

results.text: Your resources are limited. You have to think of yourself first.

title: Lightning Strike
description: A sudden thunderstorm breaks out. A lightning bolt hits a nearby tree, setting it on fire.

results.text: You take shelter and wait for the storm to pass. You are soaked but unharmed.

choices.text: Gather burning wood from the tree

outcomes.successText: You gather wood still burning before the fire goes out. Useful for starting fires.
outcomes.failureText: You burn your hand gathering the wood too quickly.

title: Buried Bunker
description: A half-buried steel door sticks out of the ground. It seems to lead underground.

outcomes.successText: After an hour of strenuous digging, you manage to open the door. Inside you find a small bunker with military supplies.
outcomes.failureText: The door is too heavy and the ground too compact. You can't open it.

results.text: You don't have time to waste digging. You move on.
